projects.title: Zendesk Help Center
projects.description: Green Security lacked a comprehensive help center for their hospital credentialing SaaS platform, despite the software containing lots of moving parts and complex user workflows. I sorted through pieces of existing FAQ content and interviewed developers and other SMEs to create categorized sets of updated, accurate, and user-friendly help articles that make it easy for hospital employees and vendors to find the answers they need in a central and searchable location.

projects.title: Getting Started with Phishing Simulation
projects.description: The Phishing Simulation Assessment documentation is a large project I completed at Trend Micro. Trend's Phish Insight product was integrated as a new feature into the Vision One XDR SaaS platform. I converted the outdated Phish Insight knowledge base articles to Phishing Simulation online help articles for Trend Vision One, which required an intial cross-analysis between the two products and then adding and rewriting content. I wrote the Phishing Simulation Assessment topic and all child topics. Tools used include oXygen with DITA XML, Git/GitHub, and Umbraco.

projects.title: Introduction to SQLite
projects.description: This is a technical article on SQLite that I wrote for the website Awesome F/OSS. I regularly contribute to Awesome F/OSS, a site dedicated to exploring the best free and open source projects in the vast universe of open source software. We publish short and digestible articles on new free and open source projects weekly. For these articles, my writing style is concise and functional, but light. Reading about software can be boring. Our goal is to introduce an open source project in an engaging way and give readers a quick rundown on how the project could help them achieve their goals. Article sections include an introduction, As Described by AI, Features, and Getting Started. From there, readers can continue with their own research, jumpstarted by our guidance and plentiful links to external resources.

projects.title: 1972 Yamaha CS3 Carburetor Removal Manual
projects.description: This is an instruction manual I wrote for Saints Engine & Machine, a mechanic shop that specializes in vintage motorcycle restoration. The manual guides the user through removing carburetors for cleaning.

projects.title: Microsoft Case Study: Taiwanâ€™s King Steel transforms into an innovation and sustainability leader
projects.description: I edited this Microsoft case study on King Steel, a Taiwanese machinery manufacturing company driving sustainability in the shoe manufacturing industry. My edits focused on improving tone, readability, and cohesion.

projects.title: What You Need to Know About E-bike Battery Safety
projects.description: This is one of several Knowledge Base articles I've written for Tern, an eco-conscious bicycle manufacturing company. The goal for these articles is to share information about products and technology in a compelling and accessible style.
